titleStmt.title: A dissection of the braine. A sermon preached at the assises in Lincoln Anno 1640. / By Michael Wigmore Rector of Thoresway in Lincolnshire, and sometimes fellow of Oriel-Colledge in Oxenford.
titleStmt.author: Wigmore, Michael, 1588 or 9-1664?
